description: Perched on the cliff overlooking the small port of Framura, the terraces at this restaurant boast one of the most stunning views in the area. The dishes served up by the young chef are a declaration of his love for Liguria (as is the wine list), featuring a remarkable selection of top-quality regional ingredients such as artichokes and asparagus from Albenga, beans from Pigna, pine nuts, prebugiun (a mixture of wild plants), Taggiasca olives and of course local fish and seafood.
